chunk:
Yoe Ympossible Cream

Brand: Yoe and Co.

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Water, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Squalane, Hydrogenated Jojoba Oil, Dimethicone, Cetearyl Alcohol, Propanediol, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Seed Water, Cetearyl Olivate, Tranexamic Acid, Niacinamide, Oligopeptide-1, Diosmine, Ceramide NP, Hyaluronic Acid, Panthenol, Tocopherol, Ergothioneine, BetaSitosterol, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate,

Seed Water, Cetearyl Olivate, Tranexamic Acid, Niacinamide, Oligopeptide-1, Diosmine, Ceramide NP, Hyaluronic Acid, Panthenol, Tocopherol, Ergothioneine, BetaSitosterol, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Saccharomyces Ferment, Lactobacillus Ferment, Porphyra Umbilicalis (Red Algae) Extract, Terminalia Chebula Fruit Extract, Zanthoxylum Alatum Fruit

BetaSitosterol, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Saccharomyces Ferment, Lactobacillus Ferment, Porphyra Umbilicalis (Red Algae) Extract, Terminalia Chebula Fruit Extract, Zanthoxylum Alatum Fruit Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glycerin, Mannitol, Phosphatidylcholine, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Chloride, Xanthan Gum, Decyl Glucoside,

Fruit Extract, Zanthoxylum Alatum Fruit Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glycerin, Mannitol, Phosphatidylcholine, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Chloride, Xanthan Gum, Decyl Glucoside, Cetyl Alcohol, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Phytate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Behenyl Alcohol, Sorbitan Olivate, Polyglyceryl-3 Stearate,

Sodium Chloride, Xanthan Gum, Decyl Glucoside, Cetyl Alcohol, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Phytate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Behenyl Alcohol, Sorbitan Olivate, Polyglyceryl-3 Stearate, Potassium Sorbate, Potassium Phosphate, Dipotassium Phosphate, Phenoxyethanol
Directions: Apply to cleansed, dry skin on the face, neck and décolletage. Can be used morning and evening. Suitable for all skin types.
